acute_aquatic_toxicity.hazard_name: Hazardous to the aquatic environment Acute
acute_aquatic_toxicity.rationale: It carried out the outside of Category from ErC50>100mg/L of algae (Green algae) (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data, 2004) .

acute_toxicity_dermal.rationale: It was set as Category 3 based on rat dermal LD50 = 861mg/kg (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data).

acute_toxicity_inhalation_dust.hazard_name: Acute toxicity Inhalation: Dusts and mists
acute_toxicity_inhalation_dust.rationale: It was set as category 3 based on 4-hour exposure LC50 = 0.558mg/L (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data) of rat inhalation (mist).

acute_toxicity_oral.rationale: Based on the rat oral LD50: 57mg/kg (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data), the substance was classified as Category 3.

carcinogenicity.rationale: Based on the description that carcinogenicity was not observed in the mouse and the rat (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data), it was out the Category.

chronic_aquatic_toxicity.hazard_name: Hazardous to the aquatic environment Long-term
chronic_aquatic_toxicity.rationale: Since not water-insoluble (aqueous solubility = 9850mg/L(PHYSPROP Database, 2005)) and acute toxicity is low.

explosives.rationale: There are no chemical groups associated with explosive properties present in the molecules.

flammable_gases.hazard_name: Flammable gases including chemically unstable gases

germ_cell_mutagenicity.rationale: There is no result of human administration cost epidemiology, an administration cost mutagenicity test, and a productive cell in vivo mutagenicity test. And the statement (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data) with negativity by the somatic cell in vivo mutagenicity test (micronucleus test which uses mouse bone marrow). So it carried out the outside of Category.

reproductive_toxicity.hazard_statement: May damage fertility or the unborn child
reproductive_toxicity.rationale: In the two-generation reduction study, the statement that the survival rate of F1 baby and reduction of weight were seen with the dose (30ppm) that toxicity was not observed for parental animals, and in the teratogenicity test of a rabbit, although a fetas did not have teratogenicity, the frequency of appearance of the slight fall of fetus weight and small fetas increased slightly by the dose which does not have toxicity in parental animals (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data). So it was set as Category 1.)

self_heating_substances.rationale: Test methods applicable to liquid substances are not available

self_reactive_substances.rationale: Classification not possible due to lack of data, though the substance contains N-O bonds as chemical groups with explosive or self-reactive properties present

serious_eye_damage_irritation.rationale: Although conjunctival vascular hyperaemia, chemosis of conjunctiva, and discharges in eye were observed in the rabbit (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data), it recovered after seven days. Therefore, it was classified into Category 2B.

skin_corrosion_irritation.rationale: Based on the statement (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data) by very slight erythema only having been seen in the rabbit, it carried out the outside of Category.

skin_sensitizer.hazard_statement: May cause an allergic skin reaction
skin_sensitizer.rationale: Based on the statement (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data) that skin sensitization was seen in the guinea pig, it was referred to as Category 1.

substances_mixtures_emit_flammable_gas_i.hazard_name: Substances and mixtures which, in contact with water, emit flammable gases
substances_mixtures_emit_flammable_gas_i.rationale: Based on the water solubility measurement was performed (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data), it is judged that it is stable in the water.

systemic_toxicity_repeat_exposure.hazard_name: Specific target organ toxicity - Repeated exposure
systemic_toxicity_repeat_exposure.hazard_statement: Cause damage to organs through prolonged or repeated exposure (nervous system, adrenal gland)
systemic_toxicity_repeat_exposure.rationale: There are the description that in a rat, with the dose (30.9 mg/kg) within the range of guidance value in Category 2, hyper cholinesterase inhibition and a neurological disorders were occured, and the description that in a dog, with the dose (5.4 mg/kg/day) within the range of guidance value in Category 1, pathological change of adrenal glant, inhibition of erythrocyte and brain cholinesterase and decrease of erythrocyte numbers were observed (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data). It was classified into Category 1 (a nervous systems, the adrenal glant) based on these informations.

systemic_toxicity_single_exposure.hazard_name: Specific target organ toxicity - Single exposure
systemic_toxicity_single_exposure.hazard_statement: Causes damage to organs (systemic toxicity, nervous system)
systemic_toxicity_single_exposure.rationale: It was considered as Category 1 (generalized, nervous system) based on the description that lethargy, diminished spontaneous activity, proneness, prone position, kyphosis position, muscle tremor, irregular breathing, piloerection, ataxia, grooming-disappeared, colored eye secretions, colored contamination in nasal meatus part, tabefaction, salivation, breathing rate slowed, limb palsy, contamination within the oral cavity, bleed nose, eye haemorrhage, and dacryorrhea were observed with oral administration, dermal administration, and inhalation in a mouse and a rat at the dose within the range of guidance value in Category 1 (41-128mg/kg, 312-786mg/kg, 0.532-0.9mg/L).
